Spinach and Artichoke Dip: Serve with tortilla chips, pita bread, or vegetable sticks. Caprese Skewers: Cherry tomatoes, fresh mozzarella balls, and basil leaves drizzled with balsamic glaze. Stuffed Mushrooms: Mushrooms stuffed with a mixture of cream cheese, garlic, herbs, and breadcrumbs.
